## Read in ClueGO Annotations
```{r}
bingo_annotation <- read.table ( "/home/ignatius/ClueGOConfiguration/v2.5.3/ClueGOSourceFiles/Organism_Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99/Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99_GO_BiologicalProcess-EBI-QuickGO-GOA_25.09.2017_00h00.txt", sep="\t", stringsAsFactors=FALSE, header=TRUE )

bingo_annotation
```

```{r}

bingo_annotation_tbl <- as_tibble( bingo_annotation)


bingo_annotation_expanded <- bingo_annotation_tbl %>% 
  mutate(   AllTheGenesInTheNode = str_split( AllTheGenesInTheNode, "\\|") ) %>%
  unnest()


bingo_annotation_expanded %>%
  distinct( AllTheGenesInTheNode) %>%
  count()
```
